featured.text: Obviously, a physically 22 person with an outdoor job under the sun will need to drink more fluid than a desk-bound person who lives and works in an air-conditioned place.
Your desk is crowded with too many unnecessary things.

definition.zh_def: 桌子，通常用於工作或學習的平面家具，通常有腿支撐。
definition.en_def: A piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs, used for working, studying, or eating.
definition.example: She placed her books on the desk before starting her homework.
